column1: length ball, on off, and he mistimes the cut to point
back of a length, on off and angling away. Shapes to cut, but under-edged onto the deck
good length, angling away. Looks to punch but misses
back of a length, rushed onto him. Pulled uncomfortably to backward square
length ball, outside off, and pulled past square leg for a couple more
another length ball, this time on his pads, and he swivels to pull along the ground to the leg-side boundary
full, outside off, and driven to cover
good length, outside off, and flat-batted past the bowler to long off
good length, outside off and seaming away. Played and missed
angling in, and worked to deep midwicket
good length, outside off, and flayed to cover. They scamper across, and the direct hit ricochets off the stumps. They steal a second
topsy turvy season continues for Salt. Bird goes length on off, and the ball holds it's line. Salt looks to defend, but the shape takes the nick... and through to the keeper
full, on off. Driven to cover
full, on off. The leg-side clip takes a thick edge past first slip instead
full, on middle. Flicked to deep midwicket
played fine on this occasion. Length ball, angling down, and helped to the fine leg fence
good length, outside off. Batsman walks across exposing his stumps to target the leg side. Misses though, and the ball hits his pad
good length on off. Angling across. Looks to cut but misses
good length on middle. Short backs away and punches to cover
through the gap between midwicket and mid on. Full, on his toes, and muscled over the infield
massive! Full, on off, and he gets his bat under this delivery. Hammered over long on
good length, on off. Too close to his body for the cut. Misses
another length ball, close to off stump. Minimal footwork while trying to cut. Misses once again
full, on off, and he muscles another lofted shot over Bird's head. Expensive over from Bird, despite three good deliveries this over
slower ball, yorker length on leg. Flicked to square leg
full, on off, and caressed straight back! Has four written all over it, but the ball clatters into the non-striker's stumps
good length, on off. Change of pace again. Smothered off the back foot
good length, angling in, and he swivels to paddle past short fine leg. Played to the fielder though
good length, on middle. Clears the front leg to slog over deep midwicket. Ball zips under his bat to the keeper
trapped! Nearly yorker length on leg, and since Short misses the flick, the umpire has no hesitation in raising his finger
length ball, outside leg. Nudged to short fine leg
back of a length, on leg stump. Worked off his hips to the leg side
good length on middle, and tucked off his hips to deep midwicket. The second run's a late call, but eventually a safe bet
lucky! Length ball on leg. Tries to pull, but inside-edged past the keeper's right for four. Missed leg stump by a tiny margin there
yorker length, on off, but Weatherald picks the slower ball well. Drilled past the fielder positioned at mid off
good length, on leg. Goes big on the leg side, but doesn't find the elevation. Stopped by backward square leg
good length, just outside off. Ball stays low as the batsman misses the cut
fuller, just outside off, and he tries to slap through point. Another play and a miss
back of a length, outside leg stump. Mistimes the pull to fine leg
length ball, just outside off. Angling away. Shapes to cut but through to the keeper once again
back of a length, on off. The cut finds point though
just two off the over after the Powerplay. This was yorker length on middle, and dug away to midwicket
good length, on off. Makes room and drills a cut to deep point for a couple
full on middle, and the attempted drive finds the fielder at cover. Not timed as well
good length on off. He uncomfortably cuts square to the fielder at deep point
good length, on off and angling away. Weatherald flays a cut, and beats the fielder at point, to take four runs
good length, on middle. Tapped leg side for a quick run
good length, on off, and paddled with the horizontal bat to midwicket
full, on leg stump. He walks across to sweep, but misses. Keeper can't hold on either, and the ball dribbles away to fine leg. Wide given by the umpire though
length ball, wide outside off. The wrong'un is cut away to point
good length, on middle, and turning into leg. He changes his grip to reverse sweep, but misses
good length, on off. Turning away, and the attempted cut is missed. Sharp take by the keeper
back of a length, outside off and turning even further away. The attempted flat-batted shot is toe-ended to third man
good length, outside leg, and he rocks back before thumping a grounded pull to deep midwicket
sliding across the left hander. Full outside off and angling further away
full, on leg stump. Flicked behind square, but Vince cuts it off near the boundary
back of a length, on leg. Guides it to third man
full, on off. Wants to hammer it straight, but the ball goes past his outside edge
full, on leg stump. Properly whipped to deep midwicket
back of a length, on middle, and flat-batted over the non-striker's head. Falls safe near mid on
pinpoint yorker to send Weatherald back. Full and fast, and beats the batsman for pace. Bat came down very late
flighted, full outside leg. The attempted sweep hits his pad and rolls away to short third man
length ball, turning away. Cut to deep point
tossed up on off, and driven down the ground to long off
full, on leg stump, and the attempted swipe is inside-edged onto his pad. Ball rolls away to point and Wells wants the run, but the batsman isn't interested
cuts this length ball off the back foot to deep point
good length on middle. Tucked off his pads to square leg
good length, on leg stump. Angling further down
good length, on off stump. Wells wants to cut square, but the ball goes over his bat. Some extra bounce this time
back of a length, on off. The attempted pull is top edged towards Pope at fine leg
good length, outside off. Flat-batted uppishly, and nearly carries to mid off!
good length, outside off, and punched through the covers. Fielder gets a fingertip to it, slowing the ball's pace down
full on off, and he flays a square drive to deep point. Too good a shot for just a single
yorker length, on leg. Dug away to mid on. Tidy way to end his spell on the evening
good length, outside off and skidding through. Wells lets it go thinking it'll be a wide
good length on off, and sliding into the stumps. Makes room to cut to point
much needed from Carey. Full, outside off, and he slaps this uppishly over cover for four
lucky! Good length, on off, and turning away. The attempted cut is edged past the keeper for another four
oh dear! Is that the momentum shift? Full toss, beyond leg stump, and everyone misses the ball
good length, outside off, and he mistimes the cut to point. Quick single
fullish, but wide. Waits for it before cutting square. Stopped by the diving fielder at cover point
good length, outside off. Cut to point
good length, outside off, but can't get bat on ball
good length, just outside off. Punched to cover
back of a length, on off. The attempted pull is mistimed to midwicket
full, on leg, and he skips across before paddling this over the vacant fine leg region!
good length, outside off and Carey skips down the ground but offers no shot. Was expecting it to be wider
full, on leg stump. The attempted sweep goes straight to deep midwicket
good length, on middle. Punched away to cover
full, outside leg stump. Deep midwicket
full, outside off stump. Drilled to extra cover for a couple more
full, on off. Steps down to sweep, but misses. Hits him plumb in front, and that's a quick raise of the finger
full, on leg stump. Nudged to deep midwicket. Carey wants two, Rashid says 'no'

full and wide outside off. Clears his front leg and looks to club it over mid off. Slices it, and the ball flies high in the air. Philippe calls for the catch, and runs across to cover for a diving catch. Poor judgment from Rashid
full, on off, and driven to mid off
good length, outside off. Plays the back foot punch to deep point
full, on leg stump. Flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
good length, on off. Worked around the corner for a single. Sharp work from the fielder stops the batsmen from taking the second
good length, outside off, from around the wicket. Swings the bat wildly and makes no connection
full, outside off, and he flays a drive to extra cover

full, on leg stump. Makes room to try and access the offside. Dug away, but in the air, and mid off dives to his right to take a smart diving catch. Big wicket! Strikers fans awfully quiet in the stands
back of a length, on off. Guided to third man
good length, wide outside off and going further away. Wants to cut but can't get bat on ball
good length, outside off and angling away. Misses the cut again. Just two off the over
back of a length, on leg stump. Wants to pull, but gloved to the keeper instead. Tailenders never enjoy chin music
full, outside off, and the attempted drive takes a thick outside edge to third man
good length, outside off. Opens the bat's face to point, but the throw gets away from the fielder backing up. They take an extra run. Much needed, from the home side's perspective
short again, on middle, but Valente ducks under it
good length, on off. Cuts behind square to the man in the deep
full, on off. Tapped to cover for a quick single. Ends his 29th birthday with a spell of 1 for 19
full and wide, and the drive is crunched square to the fielder manning the boundary
full outside off, and the drive is stopped by the fielder at cover. Hughes' dive saves the boundary and very nearly gets a run-out at the bowlers' end too
slower ball, on leg stump. Edged to cover for a single
slower ball, back of a length, outside off. Cut to Pope at third man, but he makes a hash of it near the boundary. Might be spinning away from him but he parries it on the slide to the rope
good length, on leg stump. Flicked off the bat's edge to square leg
yorker length, outside off, and slapped to point. Economy of 5 for Dwarshuis today
full on off, and drilled to mid-on. Scampers across and Conway wants the second, but Valente doesn't want it. Conway needs to dive back in

in the air and long on runs in to take the catch. Slow and wide, forcing Valente to reach at it. Plus he's through the shot too early, so the ball pops right in the air. Great deception from Curran - couldn't realise it was the slower ball from the action
full, outside off, and driven to cover
yorker length, on middle, and that's too good for Conway. Ball zips under his bat and knocks middle stump back. Strikers all out for 135
fullish, outside off. Bit of movement in. The attempted drive is inside edged onto his pads
fullish, outside off but angling into off stump. Smartly fended off the front foot by walking across and covering his stumps
good length, outside off. Wants to punch but chopped onto his back foot. Could've hit the stumps there
full, on off, and he swings leg side. Protection at deep midwicket though. Wild heave to get off the mark
back of a length on off. Punched to cover
back of a length, on off. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
full, outside off. Too full infact, and driven through the covers! Firmly played, well placed
good length, on middle, and skidding through. Uncomfortably clipped to deep square leg
googly. Length ball outside off and turning in sharply. He backs away and cuts to point
up and over! Full, on off, and he makes room before hammering this googly over Rashid's head
good length, on off. Flat-batted to mid on, where Conway dives to intercept
good length, on middle. Worked to midwicket
good length, on off, and punched through point!
back of a length, on off. Punched firmly back
good length, on middle. Goes for the wild swing across his body, and top-edges it instead. Stanlake settles under it at square leg and takes a swirling catch
nearly another one! Full on off, and the attempted flick takes a leading edge just over short cover
good length, just outside off. Punched to cover for a single
straight to the fielder! Good length, on off, and he pulls this well. But it's not high enough, and Wells plucks it at deep midwicket with ease
full, around the wicket outside off stump. Sticks the bat out and runs it to third man
good length, on middle, and angling further down leg
good length, outside off. Guided to the man behind point
full, just outside off. Defended with soft hands
back of a length, on off. Tries to paddle it from near his head, but misses. Looked high, but wide not given
good length, outside off and he drags a pull through midwicket for four
fullish, and pushed to mid-on for a quick single
full, on leg stump, and clipped to deep midwicket
good length, outside off. Sliced away through point, where Stanlake runs across to cut it off in the deep
good length, on leg. Turned around the corner to square leg
back of a length, on off. He sways away from the line of the ball
good length, outside off. Flayed away to deep point
back of a length, outside leg stump. Pulled into the gap behind square. Easy pickings
good length, outside off, and he backs away before opening the bats face. Runs it past the vacant slip region for four. That's 12 runs in three balls
fullish, outside off. Wants to work it leg-side but inside edged onto his body
back of a length, on off, from around the wicket. Cramped for space. Nudged away
back of a length, and the attempted pull is gloved onto his chest. That would hurt. Maybe the shoulder
short outside off, and he tiptoes to slap this through the point region to end the powerplay with a four
good length, on off. Turning into Vince. Worked to square leg
good length, on off. Turning away. Worked to mid on
good length, outside off. Cut behind square to deep point
full, on off. Flicked away to deep midwicket

taken at first slip! Good length, outside off and turning away. Backs away to cut, but edged past the keeper's glove to the fielder. Came sharply. Rashid strikes against a left-hander, something we don't see so often these days
good length, but too wide. Cut to third man
good length, outside off. Looks to punch, and flies past the vacant first-slip region to third man
fuller. Just outside off. Pushed straight back with the full face of the bat
good length, just outside off. Defended off the back foot
full outside off, and he drills this to the fielder manning the extra cover boundary
good length, outside off, and angling in. Nudged to midwicket
full, on leg, and pushed to midwicket. Intercepted
back of a length outside off, but slower from Siddle. Seaming away, and the attempted pull is flat-batted to mid on
good length, on middle, and worked into the gap near midwicket
good length, on middle. Worked off his hips to square leg
good length, outside off. Cut in front of square, where extra cover can't stop the second run
full, on middle, and flicked through midwicket for four! Spoils an otherwise good over
back of a length, but only 121kph. He waits for the ball before hammering a grounded pull to deep midwicket
back of a length, outside off, and he drags this to the fielder at cow corner
full, on off stump. Pushed to mid on
full outside off, and he opens the bat's face to drive towards extra cover
back of a length, outside off, and he swivels to deposit a pull to backward square leg
full, on off stump. Pushed to point
good length, on middle. Flicked off the back foot to square leg
short on off, and drilled to long on
full on off, and tapped past the non-striker. Midwicket scampers across to cut it off
full on middle, and driven with the straight bat to long on
good length on leg, and going down the leg side
that's what Strikers needed! Length ball outside off, and a bit of turn away from Vince. He looks to defend, but it takes a big nick into the keeper's gloves

two in two! First-ball duck. Good length on off, but the googly spins inwards. Edwards is caught on the wrong line, and the ball hits him in front of leg stump. Rashid's massive appeal may have convinced the umpire, because that was sliding down leg for certain
full, outside leg stump, and the keeper has to scurry across to stop the byes
full on off, and flicked to the vacant region near deep midwicket
full, on middle. Flicked confidently to deep backward square leg
good length, on leg stump. Flicked behind square on the leg side again
good length, outside off. Guided behind point off the back foot
back of a length, on off. Cramped for space. Tiptoes to defend
back of a length again to end the over. 145 kph. Gets big on Curran, and his back-foot defense is wobbly too. Ball flies off the handle to the off side
he's got a hat-trick! Full on off, and the googly turns through Silk's defense, and clips middle stump. The Strikers are now roaring! The BBL's fifth hattrick
good length, on off. Cut to point
full on middle. Driven to long on. Throw from the deep hits the bowlers' stumps and ricochets into Rashid
good length, outside off and turning in. Worked leg side
full outside off, and turning in. Firmly defended
what an over to give Strikers a shot of a win here. Good length, on off, and defended to the leg side. 4 for 22, including a hattrick
full on off, and swiped past the fielder precariously placed at short leg. Stopped by deep midwicket
full on off, from around the wicket. Defended. Applause from the crowd
full, outside off, and the attempted drive is edged to third man. Neser puts it a dive to stop the four. Strikers look pumped
good length, on leg stump. Makes room and guides it to deep point
full, on off, and muscled to deep point
back of a length, on off, and the attempted pull has enough to clear the square leg boundary! They'll take that. Stanlake ends his spell poorly
slower ball, length delivery outside off. Cut to point
around the wicket, good length on off, and the attempted pull takes the edge through to the wicketkeeper. Sixers in huge trouble now
inswinging yorker on off, but dug away to deep midwicket
worked off his body to the leg side
not given! Full on off, and the flick's been inside-edged onto his pad. Siddle thought he had his man
full, on off, and the attempted drive makes no connection. Ball goes between bat and body for the keeper as the Strikers appeal for a catch once again
full, outside off, and flayed away from his body to extra cover
back of a length, on middle. Tries to pull but gloved to backward square leg
nearly a yorker on middle. Flicked behind square
back of a length, on middle. The pull is gloved in the air, but falls short of midwicket
full outside off, and bunted past the bowler. Mid off runs across to intercept
back of a length, on middle, and he slaps a pull into the gap on the leg side
full on off stump. Driven to long on
full, outside leg stump. Dug back to mid-on
low full toss on leg stump. Flicked to midwicket. No real timing
full on off, and he swings to the leg side. Mistimed to wide long on
low full toss, on off, and drilled straight back. Long on is too wide, can't cut it off! Sixers needed that
good length, on off. Slapped to the off side
back of a length, on off, and through to the keeper. Called a wide for height
full, just outside off. Slows things down. Driven through to extra cover
full, on off. Driven to wide long on for a single
full outside off, and he slaps a drive to extra cover again
no ball for the second short ball! Did he forget? Free him incoming.
free hit continues since this is wide. Went for a length ball, but it was beyond the tramlines
sliding full toss on his pads. Inside-edges the slog onto his pads
Curran's turning it on again! Full on off, and he manages to muscle a drive past the fielder at mid off for a four
Conway gets Curran! Another twist! Yorker on middle, and Curran's lucky his toes are still intact. What a way to finish the spell
full, on off, and driven to extra cover
back of a length, on off, from around the wicket. Backs away and cuts it over point for four! Can the birthday boy win it for his team?
What a birthday Hazlewood's having! Yorker outside off, but the attempted drive takes an outside edge past the keeper
What a way to finish this game! Hazlewood hits three fours on his birthday to win it for the Sixers! Full, just outside off, and he caresses a drive through the covers.
